name: BosCar
overview: BosCar is very unplayable because of the way the action is viewed. Especially when you have to drive side ways or towards the screen. Just imagine playing Lotus while the viewpoint is directed towards your front windowscreen so you can only see what happens behind you! I've seen the idea of BosCar also in some other games and demos but the “more freedom approach” just doesn't work that well most of the time.
